channel.title: [PI] Drop Rarity
channel.description:
i know it has to be possible, how to code a percentage drop rate of more than two different drop rarites for one monster
ex:
#Bandos 6260:25 995:100
6260:50 995:2000
bandos drops at a 1 n 25 percent drop rate 100 coins and 1 n 50 percent drop rate for 2000 coins..

but i know there has to be a way to do it. like u cant make the drop rate for steel drags drag platelegs and d visage the same amount…
